author: dirty
glottocode: 'dark' form cognate with 114, but not same semantic value -MW

author: to hit
glottocode: Slap, strike with the open hand (Dty)

author: wind
glottocode: To blow (of wind); sound of wind

author: you
glottocode: Second person singular pronoun stem (Dty), Second person dual pronoun,  you (Dty), Second person plural pronoun in nucleus of the phrase (Ply)
